plot: Kate and Simon have been surviving the zombie apocalypse for three weeks now. Simon thinks he has it all worked out until his girlfriend Kate throws a spanner in the works.
title: Zombie Actually
plot_es: Kate and Simon have been surviving the zombie apocalypse for three weeks now. Simon thinks he has it all worked out until his girlfriend Kate throws a spanner in the works.
plot_en: Kate and Simon have been surviving the zombie apocalypse for three weeks now. Simon thinks he has it all worked out until his girlfriend Kate throws a spanner in the works.
